definitions.definition: The action of the verb to run .
examples: His running of the business leaves something to be desired.

definitions.definition: The activity of running as a form of exercise , as a sport , or for any other reason.
That which runs or flows; the quantity of a liquid which flows in a certain time or during a certain operation.
examples: the first running of a still

definitions.definition: The discharge from an ulcer or other sore .

examples: I'm gonna go out and do my running .

definitions.definition: The dependence of measured value, typically a coupling constant, on the energy scale at which it is probed due to higher-order interaction terms and associated renormalization issues becoming relevant; metaphorically, the "running" of the measurement from its limiting macroscopic value.

main_definition: The action of the verb to run .
secondary_definitions: The activity of running as a form of exercise , as a sport , or for any other reason.
That which runs or flows; the quantity of a liquid which flows in a certain time or during a certain operation.
The discharge from an ulcer or other sore .
( colloquial ) The act of running errands .

( physics ) The dependence of measured value, typically a coupling constant, on the energy scale at which it is probed due to higher-order interaction terms and associated renormalization issues becoming relevant; metaphorically, the "running" of the measurement from its limiting macroscopic value.
